title: Fashion to Figure's Kaplan on Growing Plus-Sized Market (Audio)
itunes:title: Fashion to Figure's Kaplan on Growing Plus-Sized Market (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Michael Kaplan, CEO and Co-Founder of Fashion to Figure, discusses how his plus-sized brand, along with many other major retailers, are transforming the advertising industry, and the growth of the company using multi-channel retailing.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
